text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in Tosu on the island of Kyushu.Soccerway.com, "Sagan Tosu"; retrieved 2012-3-6. ==History== The club was founded in 1987. *1987-1994 PJM Futures *1995-1996 Tosu Futures *1997-present Sagan Tosu ==League position== *2011 : J2 League - 2nd *2012 : J1 League - 5th *2013 : J1 League - 12th *2014 : J1 League - 5th *2015 : J1 League - 11th *2016 : J1 League - 11th *2017 : J1 League - 8th *2018 : J1 League - 14th *2019 : J1 League - 15th *2020 : J1 League - 13th ===Former position=== ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Sagan Tosu players == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.sagantosu.jp/index.php * J.League Club Guide Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Saga Prefecture Category:1987 establishments in Japan
title: Sagan Tosu
